prompts: Create a small, bipedal Pokemon that thrives in urban environments.
I want a cheerful Pokemon with bright colors and a friendly appearance.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique tail and large expressive eyes.
Make a creature that resembles a lizard and has electric powers.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into grasslands and is very playful.
Design a Pokemon known for its agility and intelligence in battles.
Show me a Pokemon with a sunny disposition and a bright yellow body.
